> <OLD>
>
> Looking for Tankor said while he continue follow him"What had happned here?"

Tankor, who had shifted into robot mode as they entered the city,
along with the other drones merely glanced at Hydras, his optics cold
and dim, "They are empties, useless scrap who have outlived thier
usefullness in the mines. Now they scrape by, begging for scraps."

They were indeed 'empties' as Tankor called them, but most of them
kept thier distance from Tankor and his troop, thier optics bright and
eager. They looked to be all manner of shapes and sizes, some of them
may have been construction worers, others may have been soldiers, but
all of them looked tired, haggard, almost diseased. If this were a
human town, humans might describe them as the wretched homeless
beggers that clog the allyways of some of the bigger cities.

Tankor led Hydras and his team into the building, large doors slid
open as he approached, and slid closed behind them, locking tight as
they did so.

Tankor tiilted his head for a moment, a vacant look comming over his
features, then he nodded and looked at Hydras, "Your team will remain
here, you will follow me to see Breakout."

(TAG)

Preston
